title: Taiman Blues: Shimizu Naoto-hen
synopsis: A tale of rivalry between two gangs, MND and Laku, and the personal vendetta between MND's Naoto and Laku's Yota.
staff: [['Dezaki, Satoshi', ['Director']], ['Yamanaka, Norimasa', ['Theme Song Arrangement']], ['Shimizu, Keizou', ['Character Design']], ['Furusawa, Yuu', ['Original Creator']]]
